name: Imperishable Knight
description:
Imperishable Knight

Fight hordes of night creatures as Dawn, the bringer of light. Banish the nightmare with bubbles of tranquility. Pick up stacking power-ups, but be careful what you pick up - the power-ups never perish. Defeat 20 enemies or pickup 15 power-ups to win the game.

WASD or Arrow Keys to move. Aim with mouse and click or space to shoot.
